metadata.Title: CVE-2022-37609 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Prototype pollution vulnerability in beautify-web js-beautify 1.13.7 viathe name variable in options.js.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
mozjs38: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
node-js-beautify: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
